      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(float position)
        Description copied from interface: Servo
        Sets the servos desired position by providing a percentage value.

        E.g.: a position value of -100 would force the servo to travel to its max. left position as defined in property Servo.PROP_END_POINT_LEFT.

        Specified by:
        setPosition in interface Servo
        Parameters:
        position - value between -100 and +100 according to Servo.POS_MAX_LEFT respectively Servo.POS_MAX_RIGHT.

      • getPosition

        public float getPosition()
        Specified by:
        getPosition in interface Servo
        Returns:
        current position value between -100 and +100[%]
